subject: Ryder Cup (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: In the last 20 years, the Ryder Cup has sprouted into an international three-day extravaganza with twists and turns off the course that match the triumph and tribulation on it.
snippet: In the last 20 years, the Ryder Cup has sprouted into an international three-day extravaganza with twists and turns off the course that match the triumph and tribulation on it.
